attributes.action: order the evaluation and the appropriate research and development of the hybrid fission-fusion nuclear reactor technology (i.e., the apnrsys) that has apparently already been offered to the UK government.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
A hybrid fission-initiated fusion nuclear reactor technology, a viable and cleaner alternative to the pure fission and pure fusion reactor technologies, has apparently been offered to the UK government. But, like many innovative ideas from unpopular sectors, this offer has been ignored. 

We surely want this cleaner nuclear technology because this could give us leadership in a relatively new field of hybrid nuclear reactor technology. Moreover, there is the danger that this nuclear technology could get into irresponsible hands if not properly acted upon.

We therefore petition the Prime Minister to act on the matter.
